author: flare (flare#0001)
install_msg: Send a message to a guilds general chat, system channel or first available channel. This features multi language support. If a language is missing, contact flare#0001 or feel free to create a PR/issue.
name: JoinMessage
short: Send a message to a guilds general chat, system channel or first available channel.
